ADMIN_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}set-fake-threshold**: Considers very recent accounts as fake accounts (change the threshold)
> **{{prefix}}blacklist [add/remove/list] (@user)**: Add/Remove a user to the blacklist
> **{{prefix}}addbonus number @user/all**: Add bonus invites to a member
> **{{prefix}}removebonus number @user/all**: Remove bonus invites to a member
> **{{prefix}}sync-invites**: Synchronize server invites and bot invites
> **{{prefix}}removeinvites**: Remove server invites
> **{{prefix}}restoreinvites**: Restore server invites
JOIN_DM_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configdm**: Setup __**join dm**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}setdm**: Desabilitar/Habilitar __**join dm**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}testdm**: Test __**join dm**__ messages
JOIN_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configjoin**: Setup __**join**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}setjoin**: Desabilitar/Habilitar __**join**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}testjoin**: Test __**join**__ messages
LEAVE_CONTENT:
> **{{prefix}}configleave**: Setup __**leave**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}setleave**: Desabilitar/Habilitar __**leave**__ messages
> **{{prefix}}testleave**: Test __**leave**__ messages
